ticket.title: Allow database specific locking clauses to be used
ticket.original-body:
AR docs say that you can use a custom locking clause like so:
Product.find(1, :lock => 'LOCK IN SHARE MODE') # select * from products where id=1 LOCK IN SHARE MODE # https://github.com/rails/rails/blob/master/activerecord/lib/active_record/locking/pessimistic.rb#L11-12
But currently arel always uses 'FOR UPDATE' (https://github.com/rails/arel/blob/master/lib/arel/visitors/mysql.rb#L5-7).
This pull request for arel fixes the bug: https://github.com/rails/arel/pull/21
Wanted to make sure this makes it in for the 3.0.5 release.
